title: Champion mastery points reward system sucks
body: It really really bothers me how champion mastery points are earned. Points should be rewarded largely on how well you play a champion and not how well your entire team plays as a team. Right now points are rewarded largely on whether you win or lose so you can go 2/30/3 and if your team wins you get like 5x the amount of champion points you would get then if you go 30/2/25 and lose. You should be rewarded largely on how well you play that champion and not how well your team plays as a whole. You're not earning team points you're earning points for how well you play a specific champion. I understand that the outcome of the game is important but it should not influence your reward points that much in this area.
